Package game

Class Orders

java.lang.Object
game.Orders
All Implemented Interfaces:
Interactions
public class Orders extends Object implements Interactions
The order class will be used to create an order, randomizing between the possible ingredients
Version:
05/20/2022
Author:
cpoon870 & Iris Chou

    Description
    Orders​(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
    creates a new order with a random amount of ingredients needed, from 1 to 4 ingredients random adds ingredients to the order

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet drawer, int count)
      draws the order to the screen on the bar at the top
      Parameters:
      drawer - PApplet for the order to be drawn on
      count - the position that the order occupies on the order shelf (0 to 4)

    • completed

      public boolean completed()
      checks whether or not each order has been completed
      Returns:
      true if an order has been completed

    • filled

      public boolean filled()
      checks whether there is more than 5 orders waiting to be filled
      Returns:
      true if the order spots are filled up
